jol.types.table
Class Index.Listener

java.lang.Object
  jol.types.table.Table.Callback
      jol.types.table.Index.Listener
Enclosing class:
Index
private class Index.Listener
extends Table.Callback

A listener class that is used to registered with the table being indexed. This listener informs the index that insertions and deletions have occurred. The listener will perform index maintenance as tuples are inserted/deleted from the reference table.

Constructor Summary
private Index.Listener()
           
 
Method Summary
 void deletion(TupleSet tuples)
          The set of tuples that were deleted from the table.
 void insertion(TupleSet tuples)
          The set of tuples that were inserted into the table.
